D

Package de.a46.memory includes all classes containing technical functionality for the memory game.

M

MainPanel - class de.a46.memory.gui.MainPanel.
Class MainPanel is the main gui class. its father-component is the applet-extending Starter, child components are a ButtonbarPanel, a LeftPanel and a RightPanel. its size is fixed 720 x 502 pixel.

this is also an active component, because it performs reaction to buttonbar clicked events and to ActionEvents from the HelpPanel and the ExitPanel.
MainPanel(RessourceContainer) - Constructor for class de.a46.memory.gui.MainPanel
Constructor.
MButton - class de.a46.memory.gui.MButton.
Class MButton represents a button that is drawing different images corresponding to its state.
